text: Kim may have garnered all of the attention in 2016, but 2017 was 100% Khloé's year to shine. The then-pregnant fitness queen dazzled in a sheer jumpsuit with silver fringe and sky-high stilettos.She and Kris danced the night away as musical greats such as Toni Braxton , Babyface, and Brian McKnight performed for the packed house. Other guests included Christina Aguilera, Scott Disick (sans girlfriend Sofia Richie), Randy Johnson, Ryan Seacrest, and, to everyone's surprise, Kylie and Travis Scott , who had been avoiding the spotlight due to the beauty mogul's under-the-radar pregnancy While Kris typically gives out the gifts at her parties, she received one of her own from famed Kardashian fanatic, Jennifer Lawrence, who sent a miniature Porsche With such a storied history of fantastic parties, it seems difficult to keep topping the previous year. But, if there's one woman who can do it, we're confident it's Kris. Keep your eyes peeled for this year's festivities — we have a feeling it'll blow us all away.
